effect.x_y: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns. Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns. Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.

short_effect.x_y: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
